meanings.definition: In or into a lower place or position.
meanings.sent1: She placed the book hereinbelow the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Please move the box hereinbelow the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat jumped hereinbelow the chair and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: The sun sank hereinbelow the horizon, painting the sky in hues of orange.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was buried hereinbelow the old oak tree, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: In the following part of this document or text.
meanings.sent1: The details of the contract are outlined hereinbelow.
meanings.sent2: Refer to the diagram hereinbelow for further clarification.
meanings.sent3: The recipe for the cake is hereinbelow, but be careful not to mix up the ingredients!
meanings.sent4: The solution to the puzzle lies hereinbelow, hidden in plain sight.
meanings.sent5: The answer to the question can be found hereinbelow, providing insight into the topic.
